NL Question: Find all persons who appeared in the book 'Clash of kings' and also belong to House Ambrose, returning their names and statuses.
Cypher: MATCH (p:Person)-[:APPEARED_IN]->(b:Book {name: 'Clash of kings'}) WITH p MATCH (p)-[:BELONGS_TO]->(h:House {name: 'Ambrose'}) RETURN p.name, p.status
failure_reason: ❌ Attribute `status` does not exist in node `Person`.
schema_validation: ❌ Attribute `status` does not exist in node `Person`.

NL Question: Find the names of all Kings who died in book 1 and were involved in a battle where the outcome for the attacker was a 'win'.
Cypher: MATCH (k:King)-[:DIED_IN]->(b:Book {name: 'Book 1'}) MATCH (k)-[:ATTACKER_KING]->(battle:Battle) WHERE battle.outcome = 'win' RETURN k.name
failure_reason: ❌ Attribute `outcome` does not exist in node `Battle`.
schema_validation: ❌ Attribute `outcome` does not exist in node `Battle`.
